thread.title: Three Points Insurance Webinar: How the Trucking Moves America Forward Campaign Impacts Your Business
thread.title_full: Three Points Insurance Webinar: How the Trucking Moves America Forward Campaign Impacts Your Business

author: Wendy Campbell
title: Three Points Insurance Webinar: How the Trucking Moves America Forward Campaign Impacts Your Business
text:
Three Points Insurance Group invites you to learn how the Trucking Moves America Forward campaign is making a difference in improving the way people view the trucking industry. This webinar will cover the impact of policymakers and the media on transportation companies and the general public. Guest speakers Elisabeth Barna, SVP of the ATA, and Kevin Burch, President of Jet Express, will review:
How Policy Decisions are Adversely Impacting Trucking Companies Why Image Is Important to Your Transportation Business How to Get Involved in Trucking Moves America Forward Controlling Public Perception to Ensure Success
Thursday, September 3, 2015 12:00 PM - 12:40 PM EDT
Click here to register
Tom Dickmeyer, Three Points' CEO said, "This important mission to improve the image of trucking led by Kevin, Elizabeth and Steve Ponder of Great West gives each of us the chance to be involved and make a difference."
About Three Points Insurance Group
Three Points Insurance Group focuses exclusively on trucking companies. Three Points Insurance provides the unique perspective of an ownership group which combines successful truck company owners and seasoned truck insurance professionals. This allows them to better understand client challenges and offer effective risk management and insurance solutions. Each member of Three Pointsâ€™ team brings substantial insurance and risk management knowledge and experience with over thirty years exclusively focused on trucking and transportation. Their associates have obtained multiple insurance industry designations and are dedicated to continuing to learn and grow. Visit their website at http://threepointsinsurance.com/ to learn more.
